website_summaries.verdict: The top brand of soda making machines. Turns your water into a carbonated treat at the touch of a button.
pros: This electric model allows you to select your desired level of carbonation and add the perfect amount of fizz with just a touch of a button
This kit includes a 1-liter, reusable BPA free carbonating bottle and a CO2 canister
cons: Unless you are recycling the CO2 canisters, the price can get to be a bit expensive

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are longtime Sodastream users...our 8 year old unit finally started to fail, so we upgraded to the One Touch. Absolute dream...easy to use, consistent, efficient. As good as the manual carbonator was this is even better. Just push the filled Sodastream bottle onto the One Touch, you don't even have to screw it in, hit the start button twice and in about 10 seconds you have a liter of fresh carbonated water. Can't emphasize enough how simple this is. We drink 4 or more liters of seltzer a day in the summer so this machine has gotten a fair bit of use since we set it up...100% reliable to date.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Wolski

customer_reviews.title: TOO MESSY!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea, but it's more of a headache because of the mess it makes every time it's used. I place the bottle. Push the button then it shoots water all over the counter. If I stick folded cardboard under the bottle then it doesn't leak out as bad. I can't recommend this based on my experiences with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Todd P Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to soda
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase a Soda Stream after using a family members. I love flavored sparkling water. It's simple to set-up and use. Cartridges and flavored drops can be bought at most large retailers. My only hesitation was making countertop space, (It is a slim 5" wide at base but it is nearly 17" high). I no longer buy cases of water and recycle cans. Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: T. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, brilliant, brilliant!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fav kitchen gadget of all time! I absolutely love this machine. Saving tons of money of seltzer and soda and I don’t have to carry all that stuff into the house anymore. Brilliant, brilliant, brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Moller

customer_reviews.title: In a wait and see mode
customer_reviews.text: This is the third unit I have purchased. I like the idea behind the product but my first two experiences ended in product failure after about 4 weeks. Both were purchased from the same store and both had the same date code. I purchased this one on line to get a different date code to see if the failure was a manufacturing or design defect. I am in a wait and see mode. Still to new to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the ease of use of this device and the quality of the result. I learned quickly to fill the bottle exactly to the mark - not over and not under. We are having fun experimenting with the various flavors by using the Sodastream drops. We are definitely drinking more water which is a good thing. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy sparkling water
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great in the kitchen. The flavors don't leave the product tasting quite the same as national brand drinks, but we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered, no information included
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a sodastream Fizzi One Touch and got something called Spirit One Touch. There's no way for me to even judge the difference because it came with zero information and for the life of me, I can't get it to work. It arrived broken. And who has time to deal with this stuff? Life and needs keep moving on while I'm left to puzzle at odd moments over what to do with this and who to contact. Any help would be appreciated. But I will not go down without a fight.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Nut

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my husband a Sodastream for Christmas and the power would not come on. I cant get a response from Sodastream to get a new one or to receive a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this on amazon prime day. After going through two canisters of CO2 gas in two weeks, our soda stream is unresponsive and will no longer operate. We have tried to call the company, but have heard no response. The product seems cheaply made with terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Can somebody tells me if this is a defect
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday. Follow the instruction. However every time I use it, the water spills everywhere. Can somebody tell me if you have the same problem? Anything I did wrong operating it?
customer_reviews.author: Yao

customer_reviews.title: Makes great seltzer
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 5 stars because it does work well, except for two things 1. You have to plug it in, kind of a pain, and it has a big block transformer plug which gets in the way. 2. If you're not careful it will fire (shoot CO2) without a bottle attached. This has happened to me twice now and I've only had it for a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: DRH

customer_reviews.title: they need to check there QC. no power supply. in box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for her birthday 10/7/19 month. When we opened it up it was missing the power supply to run stupid thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyanna Virgona

customer_reviews.title: Gives good fizzed water but directions are not easily understood
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one as the first would not work but no problems with this one as it worked first time. You must make sure that you pay strict attention to placing the bottle of water to be fizzed correctly in the opening so that it works as if it is not done properly it will not fizz. Unfortunately, the directions are done by drawings, no words and can be easily misunderstood. I find the flavors to be very disappointing, some what mettalic and bland,not worth the money at all!! You would do well to flavor on your own with citrus slices and/or herbs like mint or rosemary from the garden.
customer_reviews.author: waynjer64

customer_reviews.title: I’m really upset and disappointed about it.
customer_reviews.text: SodaStream Fizzi Sparkling Water Maker was a bad purchase from Amazon. I’m very disappointed with it, because it doesn’t work well. When The button is pressed, the liquid leaks everywhere. And the worst thing is that I only found out now that I can’t return this product. I’m really upset about that. I don’t recommend you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosana Balter

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to give this 5 stars but.....
customer_reviews.text: Reusable bottles, this is a wonderful earth-friendly alternative to buying seltzer or soda in single-use containers... huge props to SodaStream for that... HOWEVER, in using a proprietary CO2 container to focus on driving up revenue from refills (which are limited to authorized stores) drives this product down. There are adapters you can get to put aluminum CO2 (i.e. paintball) bottles and I've done that, but they are only 12 oz versus the 18 from the SodaStream versions and I haven't yet found a larger bottle that'll fit... so basically they did this horrible design due to the risk some people modify their unit in a more cost-effective and environmental way.
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I read an article about plastic waste in the ocean and decided to buy a SodaStream as my contribution to reduce plastic waste (I drink a lot of soda and sparkling water). I’m pleasantly surprised by how much I love it. It’s so easy to make sparkling water and add taste. I use the lowest amount of syrup, so it’s probably less sugar than soda bought in store. My plastic waste has gone down since I transitioned to SodaStream.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best soda stream machine ever, easy to use and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Use it.
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved sparkling mineral water such as Perrier or San Pellegrino. I did a little research on the salts in mineral water and made up my own mix that I add, and now I have access to homemade San Pellegrino whenever I want, and it's simply luxurious! I get cravings for it. And I've never enjoyed water more, or been so consistently well hydrated in my life. And of course I'm saving lots of money.
customer_reviews.author: Dancy Cat John

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant upgrade to standard SodaStream
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a manual pump SodaStream, it broke after 2.5 years. Went for the electric model and love that it has 3 bubble settings. Only thing this lacks is an indication when the cylinder is running low: it sudden;y just doesn't fizz, no warning. Yes the flavors are ridiculously expensive, and puzzled no one offers competitive flavor mixes (yet- let's hope someone does soon!), but it's still more handy than dragging endless soda cans or bottles home. And this offers ability to add a little vanilla flavor, mixing flavors (half Dr Pete- half Root Beer, or anything you can dream up).
customer_reviews.author: donmke

customer_reviews.title: Questionable function
customer_reviews.text: We use it all the time but I'm getting tired of cleaning up the mess. The seal between the bottle and the stand just plain sucks. I have to place paper towels under the bottle because the carbonation sprays out from the top of the bottle. I even put in less water than they recommend, clean the bottle top and unit's seal...it still does it 90% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Fuzzy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it, once I received it. Got lost at one point. Finally received it after a couple of weeks. Was bought as a replacement for a slightly different machine which did not work at all. This one works great 👍. The other one had one big button on top to control fizz manually and It did not carbonate at all. This one has 3 buttons to control fizz and it actually plugs in. This one is as advertised. 👍👍👍.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It was an upgrade for me and I was happy to see the electric versions come out so that I can be a bit more consistent with the fizz! I was a little confused the first time I used it and didn't realize you have to double tap the buttons to turn it on. It's easy, it's consistent and not as noisy as the original models. So far I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee Burger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CO2 infuser.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine, however, I dont have anything to compare it too. The carbonation it infuses is perfect and I only use to lowest setting. I needed something like this very badly because my soda intake was out of control. The operattion manual was limited. It doesn't tell you how to seat your bottle correctly, so the first time I tried it, it fizzed out all over my counter top and all over everything else near by. Lesson learned the hard way. Suggestion: Carbonate water before you try to carbonate anything else for the first time. You wont have a sticky mess everywhere if you dont have it seated correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kozmo

customer_reviews.title: No Refills Available
customer_reviews.text: Device works great. I love it. Which is why I'm giving it two stars instead of one. But Sodastream fails to mention that they are out of stock on the refill cartridges, as are most of their retail partners. It seems unethical to sell a product that they know will be useless in a month or two. They blame covid for this (check their website) which is plausible. But they ought to warn buyers that refills are unavailable. Consider buying a 10 or 20 pound carbon dioxide tank and fittings that will allow you to refill the cartridges yourself. I've spent over $100 on Sodastream tanks that are useless for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: knickerbocker

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool. Refilling tanks is annoying
customer_reviews.text: Sodastream is not a fun company to work with for refilling your tanks. They don't have a direct relationship with Amazon for the CO2 tanks, so they cost 3x as much on Amazon. IF you go to there website then shipping takes 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby Doo

customer_reviews.title: very hard to get a good seal between the bottle and machine
customer_reviews.text: When it works properly, it makes good carbonated water. However, it more often than not shoots water out of the top of the bottle resulting in a big puddle on the counter and only sort of carbonated water inside the bottle. Dissappointing
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy if you want your kitchen and self covered with water, the bottle doesn’t lock in air tight and water goes everywhere and It cannot be returned
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Love this Soda Stream
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my Soda Stream after three years! I used it everyday often drinking as much as four liter bottles a day. I purchased Soda Stream Fizzi One Touch Sparkling Water Maker (Black) with CO2 and BPA free Bottle! not be happier with my purchase! I need my seltzer on a daily basis! You can also purchase your cylinders online at sodastream through their exchange policy for refreshing your gas cylinders! Easy as can be! It is a little harder during this pandemic to get the cyclinders but so, worth trying to me, anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Copp

customer_reviews.title: Family loves it...
customer_reviews.text: First off, I want to warn you, THE BOTTLE IS NOT DISHWASHER SAFE. Which this is very disappointing because I purchased extra bottles also made by Sodastream that are dishwasher safe. So don't melt your bottle as we did. Other than the bottle not being dishwasher safe and having to be thrown away after one use, my hubby loves his soda maker. We have tried a few flavors so far and all are good. My favorite is the energy drink with raspberry flavor added (all Sodastream brands). It is easy to use and the kids like to be able to mix the flavors for a new drink experience.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new Soda Stream. So far, all is well with it. Love that we're using so much less plastic (even if we do live in a returnable bottle state - no bottles taking up space, needing to be returned. Love the BPA free refillable bottles. The flavors are pretty awesome, too. Easy to use, takes up little counterspace. So glad we sprung for it. It will pay for itself in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally got one!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my SodaStream. No more piles of plastic bottles in the recycling bin. The flavor is better than bottled selzer - plus I get the super-fizzy water I like. Why did I wait so long to get one?
customer_reviews.author: CT Snow

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love the One Touch!
customer_reviews.text: Love my SodaStream!! This unit is so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: love the fizz. nice to have carbonated drink whenever.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it is supposed to. I buy different brand of flavors that work well. The only downside is when you first load the bottle into the unit, you have to attach it just so, (maybe gently would be another way to say it) otherwise the water blasts out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeJ

customer_reviews.title: If you receive a faulty one, contact customer services
customer_reviews.text: At first we were extremely disappointed with this product. It just never got the water very fizzy, even using the highest level of gas. We tried everything - taking it apart, replacing the gas cylinder etc. and nothing helped. At that point I would have given it one star. Even though we were several months on by this point I called the SodaStream customer service number. The adviser was extremely helpful, ran me through a series of tests, and then sent a free replacement. The new machine arrived quickly and works perfectly! Super fizzy water even using the first button. Hence my upgrade to 5 stars. Don't hesitate to contact SodaStream if yours isn't working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Mistake!
customer_reviews.text: After calculating the costs of CO2 refills and duration of use found it cheaper to buy cases of seltzer at COSTCO. An expensive mistake on my part.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty epic, and HUGE savings
customer_reviews.text: Can't even tell you how much money I spend on (plain) fizzy water, so the OneTouch is definitely more economical. Only problem is you can't refill the CO2 canisters yourself, but if you search on Amazon you find a tip that allows you to use generic paintball CO2 canisters for even MORE savings. Either way, I couldn't be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a month. After using it properly.
customer_reviews.text: it broke after less than a month owning it. And I use it completely properly. Buyers beware —short shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Family

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 6 months then started making flat water even with a new CO2 canister. Contacted support trying to get a warranty replacement. They had me fiddle with it instead, works about 25% of the time now, so we basically stopped using it. Try the non electric version instead probably less likely to randomly stop working
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Saving me a lot of money, I drink a lot of sparkling water.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived broken, but I contacted the vendor from the phone number on the box and they sent me a new one for free. This works better than I expected and my first CO2 cartridge lasted a month with daily use. Target and other stores take your old CO2 containers and you can exchange them for new ones at half the price (like $15).
customer_reviews.author: IMNRN

customer_reviews.title: tired of lugging seltzer from the store
customer_reviews.text: We had tried SodaStream b4 and were a bit disappointed. Ditto with the current manual model. Friend said you must get the Fizzi electric pushbutton. Now we're talking. 3 settings and the lightest is fine. Key is to cool water before adding fizz. Highly recommend. Get extra empty bottles. Check for a local canister exchange.
customer_reviews.author: saxman

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary power supply
customer_reviews.text: Another giant thing on the counter top that needs a power cord! There a 3 buttons at the top that could be eliminated by just pushing one button more times. That infuser stick is looking awkward when there is no bottle attached.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie JD

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine. Easy to use, affordable and great tasting. The one drawback would be that sodastream does not have a glass bottle to use with this machine. It only comes with the BPA free plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great fizzy water easy & instantly!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to carbonate my own purified water. I have not flavored any water at this time. With 3 intensities selectable, the carbonation works terrific. OK price for the machine which is ridiculously easy to use, however the replacement CO2 bottles are pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Kehler

customer_reviews.title: Bottle doesn't hold the bubbles.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it would be nice if the bottle that comes with it would maintain the carbonation for more than about 30 minutes. In order to keep my water bubbly I have to put it in a different container after charging it - kind of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the one touch
customer_reviews.text: Product does not match the description. This is the fizzi classic, not the one touch. I searched for a while to try and find the one touch, just to get this and not be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Use it Often, Despite Some Jank
customer_reviews.text: The way the bottle connects to the console desperately needs to be redesigned. If I don't stick my finger underneath the bottle while the water is carbonating, it leaks everywhere. Still, I use this thing all the time and save a lot of money and physical energy by no longer hauling bottles and cans up three flights of stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebootin' Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Its cool to have it, and create new flavors
customer_reviews.text: Was gift for Bday for my husband, before we always had full fridge of sodas , now we have few bottles, looks like he like it always different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Taty

customer_reviews.title: Such a money saver instead of buying bottled, flavored water.
customer_reviews.text: I really am not good at drinking all the water I should each day so with this I get the fizz & flavor I like. Have had it about 6 weeks. Since it’s just me using I haven’t had to get another canister. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband was told to cut out sodas so I got this for him. It’s very easy to put together (add CO2) & using just as easy! Now my husband actually drinks water!! Lots of flavor options, too!
customer_reviews.author: pengwen65.

customer_reviews.title: Good Taste, East to Use, Eco Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try this for a long time....finally invested. It takes a little time and money to experiment with the taste profiles you like and the CO2 cylinders are no bargain, but it's easy and tastes good. Plenty of You Tube ideas on how to get the costs down. I like it an recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hoover

customer_reviews.title: problematic
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work at all. Furthermore, Amazon says I cannot return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Kondrat

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered - BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and paid for a one-touch. I received an Fizzi regular, in a box completely in German, that doesn't work. This is the first time this has happened to me on Amazon -- and I can't return it. BUYER BEWARE - ITEM IS NOT WHAT YOU PAY FOR.
customer_reviews.author: Peter T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but not inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is a lot of fun. Just a little surprised that the CO2 cylinders don't last very long. You can probably find carbonated water or sugar free sparkling water or seltzer for less at the super market. But it is really fun, and my kids and I both love it. We've tried all kinds of flavored water enhancers and one shots. There is always something exciting about the pressurized injections. My kids love to press the double burst, twice.
customer_reviews.author: Conjo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love soda stream machines, but this was a disappointment. My old one touch gave out after more than a year, and I wanted the same replacement. I ordered the one touch soda stream that was pictured and what arrived was the first generation that provides much less fizz and has no electrical power or options for how much fizz you want. I was charged for the one touch machine which is significantly more expensive. This is the first negative review I’ve ever written.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I will never ever buy soda ever again. It works great and looks super cool. Use it with cold water with couple drops of lime and mint leaves and you have yourself a home-made Perier! Even can make yourself a legid mineral water with Magnesium Calcium drop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and get going. We just ordered a bunch of flavors to try. So far the Ginger Ale, Cola, and Rootbeer are tasty. The CO2 that comes with with the unit lasts a long time as well. Also just found out you can get replacement canisters for half price at Target when you swap your old canister.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: I was anxious ordering SodaStream Fizzy One Touch after reading reviews, but the experience was nothing but positive. The instructions that came with it, could have been clearer, and installing the gas canister was slightly awkward. I had to flip the device over to ensure the right canister fit. The water came out perfect. If you make sure that the parts for tightly and feed the device with cold/chilled water, then the results will be excellent. One touch feature works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dina S

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Works much better than the original version. The operation is easy, seems to be well made. I haven’t used the flavor option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective within two months.
customer_reviews.text: Within two months this product no longer works. The three button lights on the top to choose carbonation level are just flashing faintly and the machine is no longer working.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Costa

customer_reviews.title: The environment
customer_reviews.text: I like the soda stream. It is solidly built and quickly provides some nice seltzer without having to buy plastic bottles.
customer_reviews.author: anneke

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for a friend. I have 2!! I love my soda stream and so does the friend I gave it to!
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Hope they could use better material.
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, I think the manufacturer should use better material. There is also another think that I didn't like this product is the back part which is hard to close.
customer_reviews.author: Sun and  moon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sometime during black friday sale. It was the perfect gift for my husband. He loves sodas and now he can make them on the spot right from home with any flavors he likes. The machine is easy to use. Just press the button and it does all the work for you. Note: you can only fizz water then add flavor after.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Such a great product
customer_reviews.text: If you like bubble water, You must buy it!! This is really nice. I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Midori

customer_reviews.title: Literally stopped working after 1 day...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to start using this device. I was really hoping to cut down on my waste of fizzy water cans. But it stopped working just after 1 day! Wth. I'm pretty sad and disappointed about this.
customer_reviews.author: cmn165

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Wish I didn’t wait so long to purchase one. I had an old one and this one blows it away.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: They said best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my girlfriend and her and her kids have loved it! Easy to use and no manual labor involved :)
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 3

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and replaces all the cans I recycle
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested I would like the Sodastream as she has one. I buy a lot of Lacroix and this is wonderful! I bought some grapefruit drops and like that. Also put lime juice another day and like that too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Koster Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing; Soda Stream brand declines; seller refuses return; do not buy
customer_reviews.text: We've owned previous Soda Streams and enjoyed them for years. Our most recent one stopped working so we did some research and found this one as highly rated. Based on my experience -- the fizzer barely fizzes, and the company won't back the product and accept a return -- I'd discourage anyone from buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your $
customer_reviews.text: The product worked well for the first month or so with making one bottle every 1-2 days then it was difficult to get the replacement cartridges, it seemed everyone was out of stock at the same time If Ordering on line from the company, you are charged a ridiculous amount of money for shipping. My return window closed in July (I got it mid June) so now I’m stuck with a machine I can’t use and out over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Trapani

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat little seltzer machine.
customer_reviews.text: Makes fine seltzer water and flavored seltzer water. Good and bubbly if you want it like that or makes a good pear-ee-yay imitation if that's your thing (it's mine sit this will save $ in the long run.) Instryare not terribly clear but check out YT University. Will make a terrible mess if you don't get it exactly right. Oh and some stores give you 50% off the co2 cartridges when you exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: GEOFF STUART

customer_reviews.title: Pure water only
customer_reviews.text: Good machine but don't use flavored or infused water. I try to challange it by doing so. And it got everywhere. Do the infusion after!!!
customer_reviews.author: Berggie

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors and food for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Sodastream is amazing. Very easy to use and love the different flavors (we use the natural ones in the small bottles). Most importantly, we figured out we’re putting 250 - 300 fewer seltzer bottles out into the environment each year.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg J. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Sold A Broken Machine: No Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Machine was broken when delivered and SodaStream did nothing about it. I was stuck w/ a $120 paperweight. I’ll never buy anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bosoca

customer_reviews.title: SodaStream Sparkling Water maker
customer_reviews.text: The first unit that was sent to me did NOT work at all! So Amazon sent me another unit quite quickly. The issue was a defective sparkling water maker unit. The electric cord was ok as were other unit components. Great product but just guess that I got a bad one to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the bottle cap! The edge is sharp enough to hurt finger
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great and I enjoy the bubble a lot. But it seems no one bring out the problem, or i might be the only one. Be careful with the bottle cap! The edge is sharp enough to hurt finger!! I was hurt twice within two days. The cap is tight enough to prevent the bubble out, but it’s also need to work hard to open it. That’s why I hurt my fingers.
